title: [K-12] Emotional Intelligence Development Workshop for Team-based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts, experience in team activities
context.additional_context: A math education enhancement program for the general public, emphasizing field-based practical learning.

learning_goals: Learners achieve an 80%+ utilization rate of emotional recognition and management skills in team projects over 14 weeks.
Learners apply phenomenological journaling methods to analyze emotional changes during team learning in three stages: concrete events—emotional responses—reflective insights.
Learners develop collaborative communication strategies that reduce team conflicts during mathematical problem-solving by 50%+ using emotional intelligence.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
